mapper.sql: SELECT style_num, product_id, color_code, sale_state, created_dt, created_id, updated_dt, updated_id FROM product_kind
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_kind (style_num, product_id, color_code, sale_state, created_id, updated_id) VALUES (#{style_num}, #{product_id}, #{color_code}, #{sale_state}, #{created_id}, #{updated_id})
mapper.select: SELECT pk.style_num, pk.product_id, pk.color_code, p.p_sale_price, pc.english_color, pc.korean_color, pi.photo_url FROM product_kind pk JOIN product p ON pk.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_color pc ON pk.color_code = pc.color_code JOIN product_image pi ON pk.style_num = pi.style_num WHERE pk.style_num = #{style_num}
